name: MAGIC ITEM (10): CAT CRYSTAL
description:
Inspired wizards of Europe made this 3D image
of a cat ... inside a crystal ... using lasers.

There is not much I need to say about this. 

I mean ...

Do you love cats? I do. 

Do you love lasers? I do. 

Do you love crystals? Of course!!!

Well ... 
this is a 3D cat, 
etched inside a crystal --
... by lasers.

If I have to explain why this thing is awesome, maybe it's just not speaking to you but ... c'mon!

Lazer + Cat + Crystal = YESSSSSS!

Just contemplating the intense coolness of the concept will charge up your lazer cat crystal batteries for a day. And we all need that! 

Zap, Meow, Cha-Ching!

This digital "token" confers upon you
a portion of the aesthetic and para-natural
power of this radiant meta-object.

Think on the maker of this physical item
and send them your gratitude
through the centuries - for the
privilege of holding it's
meta-verse avatar.

I truly hope my photo gives a portion
of that ice-cold lazer-cat energy to you.

HPL
